message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me is $1,200,000.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This offer reflects the true value and potential of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $1,350,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. This is my final offer, as I'm not willing to go any higher.
